Posts.Content: Good morning peeps, I had breast cancer at the beginning of the year and after chemo and mastectomy was given the all clear.. About 4 weeks ago I was given the news that my breast cancer has gone secondary and has metastasis in the brain...more than 6 is all I know atm....I have had Radiotherapy and am on steroids. I am so puffed up that I'm struggling to move, is this normal on steroids....I mentioned my puffiness to my Radiographer, they just said "see your GP"....any advice on this matter would be greatly appreciated....
Posts.Title: Struggling.....

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply Carolyn, I am still on Herceptin injections every 3 wks.....mets only in brain that I know of atm, I have had a ct scan but will not get the results until I see my Oncologist 1st Feb....every thing is up in the air at the moment....I'm not getting the answers that I need to hear.....I don't want to bother my GP, and I'm worried that if I phone anyone else they will just say go to hospital....the last thing I want at the moment is to end up there. I'm just concerned that something isn't right... Xx
